name: Complaint Report
query:
SELECT 
     date as "Date:Data:100",
    pid as "PID:Data:100",
    name1 as "Type:Data:250",
    patient_phone as "Mobile:Data:100",
    doctor as "Doctor:Data:250",
    department as "Department:Data:90",
    comments  as "Comment:Data:1500"
    
FROM 
     `tabPatients Complaint`
where solved='No'
